mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Reply(writer_name,reg_time, reply_content) VALUES (#{writerName}, SYSDATE(), #{replyContent});
mapper.select: SELECT r.reply_seq AS replySeq, r.writer_name AS writerName, r.reg_time AS regTime, r.reply_content AS replyContent, r.movie_seq AS movieSeq, m.title AS title FROM Reply r JOIN Movie m ON m.movie_seq = r.movie_seq;
SELECT reply_seq AS replySeq, writer_name AS writerName, reg_time AS regTime, reply_content AS replyContent, movie_seq AS movieSeq FROM Reply WHERE movie_seq = #{movieSeq};
mapper.update: UPDATE Reply SET writer_name =#{writerName} , reply_content = #{replyContent} WHERE writer_name = #{writerName};
